title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 January 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:09 <recompile> has joined #xwiki  
00:09 <recompile> hi  
00:12 <recompile> i have a problem installing xwiki-enterprise-web-3.3 on tomcat6 with mysql on debian  
00:12 <recompile> Wrapped Exception: Could not create a DBCP pool. There is an error in the hibernate configuration file, please review it.  
00:13 <jvdrean1> has joined #xwiki  
00:13 <jvdrean> has quit  
00:14 <recompile> and with some exceptions in the tomcat/localhost.log i can not understand why its not running ;(  
00:16 <recompile> com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException: Error number 3001 in 3: Cannot load class com.xpn.xwiki.store.migration.hibernate.XWikiHibernateMigrationManager from param xwiki  
00:16 <recompile> can anyone give me a hint on that ?  
00:16 <recompile> do i miss a jar or something ?  
00:18 <@sdumitriu> Hi recompile  
00:19 <@sdumitriu> Did you put the mysql connector jar in WEB-INF/lib?  
00:21 <recompile> sdumitriu yes, and when i remove it the errormsg changes ;)  
00:21 <recompile> i have added sql\_mode="" and     <property name="hibernate.query.factory\_class">org.hibernate.hql.classic.ClassicQueryTranslatorFactory</property>  
00:21 <recompile> i have used root mysql access as well  
00:22 <recompile> i have changed dialect property  
00:23 <@sdumitriu> There should be already a section in hibernate.cfg.xml for mysql that you should uncomment instead of the default one  
00:23 <@sdumitriu> Did you create the database before?  
00:23 <@sdumitriu> XWiki will create the tables, but you need to create the database first  
00:24 <recompile> yes i have first used the section from the install howto and then i have uncommented the one in hibernate.cfg  
00:24 <recompile> sdumitriu i have created the db with user xwiki privileges all and i have created tables with that user in the console  
00:27 <recompile> and i restart tomcat after every change in config  
00:28 <@sdumitriu> Is mysql listening on a TCP port or is it just listening on a socket?  
00:29 <recompile> good idea ;)  
00:33 <recompile> its listening on an interface, i have tried, 127.0.0.1, 127.0.0.1:3306, 192.168.1.110, localhost. still the same problem  
00:34 <recompile> jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/xwiki?useServerPrepStmts=false&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8  
00:34 <recompile> like this  
00:35 <recompile>  mysql -h localhost -u xwiki -p  
00:35 <recompile> works  
00:36 <@sdumitriu> Can you pastebin the config file?  
00:37 <recompile> yes  
00:39 <jvdrean1> has quit  
00:40 <recompile> sdumitriu please take a look http://pastebin.com/rGvyD1uT  
00:40 <Enygma`> has quit  
00:41 <recompile> and the tomcat localhost logfile http://pastebin.com/AkEnN05R  
00:42 <@sdumitriu> java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused  
00:43 <@sdumitriu> Try to telnet to the port, see if it answers  
00:43 <@sdumitriu> (if you have it installed)  
00:43 <@sdumitriu> Or:  
00:43 <@sdumitriu> netstat -ltpn  
00:44 <recompile> i have now granted access over the 192. ip and MySQLInnoDBDialect  
00:44 <recompile>  Errors in named queries: listGroupsForUser, listGroupsForUserInOtherWiki  
00:45 <recompile> so that was the first config problem ;)  
00:49 <tekzilla> has quit  
00:50 <@sdumitriu> Which version of mysql do you have?  
00:51 <recompile> sdumitriu server says 5.1.49-3-log  
00:51 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
00:52 <recompile> with mysql-connector-java-5.1.7.jar  
00:53 <@sdumitriu> Can you try a newer one? http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/mysql/mysql-connector-java/5.1.18/  
00:53 <rrodriguez> has quit  
00:54 <recompile> sdumitriu i have removed sensless <property name="hibernate.query.factory\_class">org.hibernate.hql.classic.ClassicQueryTranslatorFactory</property>  
00:54 <recompile> from hibernate.cfg  
00:54 <recompile> it starts now ;)  
00:54 <recompile> thanks ;)  
00:55 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki
